targets.query: SELECT last("temperature_ambient") FROM "POWER" WHERE device=~/$device/ and component_name=~/(?i)chassis.*/ GROUP BY device
select last(power_system_capacity) from POWER  where device=~/$device/ and component_name=~/(?i)chassis.*/  AND $timeFilter  group by device, VERSION, MODEL, component_name fill(0)

select last(power_system_allocated), last(power_system_capacity),  last(power_system_maximum), last(power_system_remaining), last(power_system_usage) from POWER  where device=~/$device/ and 
 component_name=~/(?i)chassis.*/  AND $timeFilter group by device, component_name fill(0)
SELECT "power_system_usage" FROM "POWER" WHERE "device"=~ /^$device$/  group by device, MODEL
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^^FPC+\d$/ and used_power!= 0 and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT output_power FROM "POWER" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)PSM|PDM|PEM.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)Fan.*/ and used_power!= 0 and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)CB|SIB|SFB|RE|SCB|SF|Routin.*/ and used_power!= 0 and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT temperature FROM "POWER" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT last(used_power), last(power_maximum) FROM "POWER" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^^FPC+\d$/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^^FPC+\d$/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT last(used_power) FROM "POWER" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)Fan.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)Fan.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT last("fan_speed") FROM "POWER" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY component_name fill(0)
SELECT ("fan_speed") FROM "POWER" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY component_name fill(0)
SELECT last(used_power) FROM "POWER" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)CB|SIB|SFB|RE|SCB|SF|Routin.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)CB|SIB|SFB|RE|SCB|SF|Routin.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT last(output_power) FROM "POWER" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)PSM|PDM|PEM.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT output_power FROM "POWER" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)PSM|PDM|PEM.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
